turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a caffè latte from Starbucks on Allen Road in Woodhaven, Michigan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size would you like your drink in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti caffe latte with 2% milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and with four raw sugars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: mixed in or on the side?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, a venti caffe latte with 2% milk and 4 raw sugars mixed in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you wanted to pick up at the starbucks on alan road, is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have sent your order to that location, your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
